flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
人の　感情を　察知する　力を　持ち
トレーナーが　明るい　気分の　ときには
一緒に　なって　喜ぶ　ポケモンだ。

Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its
Trainer is in a cheerful mood, this Pokémon grows cheerful
and joyous in the same way.

Ralts ha la capacità di percepire le emozioni delle persone.
Se il suo Allenatore è di buon umore, questo influisce
positivamente sul carattere di Ralts, che crescerà così
allegro e gioioso.

Ralts tiene la habilidad de percibir las sensaciones que tiene
la gente. Si su Entrenador está alegre, este Pokémon se
pondrá igualmente contento.

Trasla hat die Fähigkeit, die Emotionen von Menschen
wahrzunehmen. Wenn sein Trainer gute Laune hat,
ist dieses Pokémon ebenfalls fröhlich.

Tarsal a le pouvoir de ressentir les émotions des gens.
Si son Dresseur est d’humeur joyeuse, ce Pokémon devient
lui aussi gai et enjoué.

사람의 감정을 감지하는 힘을 지녀서
트레이너가 밝은 감정일 때는
함께하며 기뻐하는 포켓몬이다.

ひとの　かんじょうを　さっちする　ちからを　もち
トレーナーが　あかるい　きぶんの　ときには
いっしょに　なって　よろこぶ　ポケモンだ。

頭の　ツノで　人の　気持ちを　感じ取る。
人前には　めったに　姿を　現さないが
前向きな　気持ちを　キャッチすると　近寄る。

Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on
its head. This Pokémon rarely appears before people.
But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person
has a positive disposition.

Ralts percepisce le emozioni delle persone usando le corna
poste sul capo. Raramente si fa vedere dagli esseri umani,
ma se percepisce un’energia positiva provenire da qualcuno
è possibile che si avvicini.

Ralts percibe las sensaciones de la gente por los cuernos que
tiene encima y detrás de la cabeza. No es común que este
Pokémon aparezca en público, pero cuando lo hace, se acerca
si ve buena disposición en la gente.

Trasla nimmt mit den Hörnern an seinem Kopf die Gefühle
von Menschen wahr. Menschen bekommen dieses Pokémon
nur selten zu Gesicht. Wenn es bemerkt, dass eine Person
gut gelaunt ist, traut es sich näher an sie heran.

Tarsal ressent les émotions des gens grâce à ses cornes.
Ce Pokémon se montre rarement, mais il arrive qu’il s’approche
d’une personne s’il la sent dans un état d’esprit positif.

머리의 뿔로 사람의 기분을 감지한다.
사람 앞에는 좀처럼 모습을 나타내지 않지만
긍정적인 기분을 캐치하면 다가온다.

あたまの　ツノで　ひとの　きもちを　かんじとる。
ひとまえには　めったに　すがたを　あらわさないが
まえむきな　きもちを　キャッチすると　ちかよる。

人や　ポケモンの　感情を
敏感に　キャッチ。敵意を　感じると
物陰に　隠れる。

It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and
Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

È molto sensibile agli umori delle persone e degli altri
Pokémon. Se avverte ostilità, va a nascondersi.

Capta muy bien lo que sienten las personas y los
Pokémon. Cuando nota cierta hostilidad, se esconde.

Es nimmt die Gefühle der Menschen und Pokémon
mit großer Sorgfalt wahr. Spürt es Feindseligkeit,
versteckt es sich.

Il est très sensible aux émotions des gens et
des Pokémon. Il se cache au moindre signe
d’hostilité.

사람이나 포켓몬의 감정을
민감하게 캐치한다. 적의를
느끼면 그늘로 숨는다.

ひとや　ポケモンの　かんじょうを
びんかんに　キャッチ。てきいを
かんじると　ものかげに　かくれる。

赤いツノで　人や　ポケモンの
温かな　気持ちを　キャッチすると
全身が　ほのかに　熱くなる。

If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or
Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.

Se con le corna avverte emozioni positive di persone
o Pokémon, il suo corpo si scalda leggermente.

Si sus cuernos perciben emociones positivas de
personas o Pokémon, su cuerpo se calienta un poco.

Es erfasst warme Gefühle von Menschen
und Pokémon mit seinen Hörnern und wärmt
sich daran auf.

Quand ses cornes captent les ondes positives d’un
Pokémon ou d’un humain, son corps se réchauffe.

빨간 뿔로 사람이나 포켓몬의
따뜻한 마음을 캐치하면
전신이 미약하게 뜨거워진다.

あかいツノで　ひとや　ポケモンの
あたたかな　きもちを　キャッチすると
ぜんしんが　ほのかに　あつくなる。

If its horns capture the warm
feelings of people or Pokémon,
its body warms up slightly.

If its horns capture the warm
feelings of people or Pokémon,
its body warms up slightly.

If its horns capture the warm

positives d’un Pokémon ou d’un
humain, son corps se réchauffe.

Quand ses cornes captent les ondes

humain, son corps se réchauffe.

The horns on its head provide
a strong power that enables
it to sense people’s emotions.

The horns on its head provide a
strong power that enables
it to sense people’s emotions.

If its horns capture the warm
feelings of people or Pokémon,
its body warms up slightly.

It uses the horns on its head to
sense human emotions. It is said to
appear in front of cheerful people.

It uses the horns on its head to
sense human emotions. It is said to
appear in front of cheerful people.

It is highly attuned to the emotions of
people and POKéMON. It hides if it senses
hostility.

It is highly attuned to the emotions of
people and POKéMON. It hides if it senses
hostility.

A RALTS has the power to sense the
emotions of people and POKéMON with the
horns on its head. It takes cover if it
senses any hostility.

RALTS has the ability to sense the
emotions of people.
If its TRAINER is in a cheerful mood, this POKéMON grows cheerful and joyous
in the same way.

RALTS senses the emotions of
people using the horns on its head.
This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws
closer if it senses that the person has
a positive disposition.
